room_title: Escape room "Escape from 108 Ocean Ave." by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: Did the 108 Ocean Ave. room for our first ever escape room and had a blast!Staff was wonderful, all of the clues, and puzzles were great. We escaped, yay! The cost was definitely worth the fun, not expensive at all. We are definitely headed back to try the other rooms. Highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from 108 Ocean Ave." by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: So much fun and the staff was great. You can tell they put a lot of time and effort into their rooms. I broke the 102 ocean Ave record and will definitely be back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from 108 Ocean Ave." by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: This was my 3rd time here and our group yesterday broke the record for 108 Ocean Ave! Each interaction with the staff has been fantastic. They love what they do and pass that excitement on to their guests. Would recommend in a heartbeat! Great time had by all!
